articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Manhunt under way after gunmen kill nine near South Africa’s Johannesburg - Al Jazeera
articles.description: Motive unknown after about a dozen gunmen in minibus and car target tavern in Bekkersdal township, police say.
articles.content: At least nine people have been killed and 10 wounded when armed men opened fire at a tavern in a township near the city of Johannesburg in South Africa, police said, adding that some victims were ran… [+2693 chars]
